content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER, warning: [not receiving electricity]).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with warning [out of fuel]; holds a fluid box of approximately 190 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering about 99 units of water.
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 75974 (status: WORKING).
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 75973 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 75986 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 75985 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 75981 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 75990 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 75989 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 75992 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 75993 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 75994 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Confirm that inventory items are accessed through attributes they support to avoid mismatches and attribute errors.

• Steam Engine Repositioning:
  - Before attempting to reposition the steam engine, verify that candidate pipe groups with the specified fluid system exist within the defined search radius. Repositioning attempts using fluid_system values [74564, 74812, 74978, 75062, 75144, 75228, 75310, 75394, 75476, 75560, 75642, 75726, 75808, 75892] have consistently returned zero candidates. Reassess search parameters and examine the spatial layout of the surrounding pipeline infrastructure to secure valid candidates.
